And if you're looking for something a little more light-hearted, I'd recommend the French film "Le Grand Bain" about a group of middle-aged men who start a synchronized swimming team. As for French films, I absolutely loved "Amélie" and highly recommend giving it a watch if you haven't already seen it. Another classic French film that I've always enjoyed is "The 400 Blows". Have you seen either of them yet?

Looking forward to hearing your thoughts on those recs and to sharing more movie and music recommendations with you soon!
